text: Jan Thorstensen (28 May 1933 - 20 August 2014) was a Norwegian alpine skier, born in Oslo. He competed in slalom and giant slalom at the Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Jan Thorstensen
